about.title: Auditore Family
about.description1: Auditore was founded on May 12, 2020. I, AizeN, always had the desire to create a group, but I was waiting for the right moment to make it a reality. The surname "Auditore" was inspired by the game Assassin's Creed; I thought it was really cool and decided to name the group after it.
about.description2: From the beginning, I always had a very clear vision of what I wanted for Auditore. My goal was to create a group different from others at the time: something more organized and with a different approach. I observed the families of the time with 4 founders, 5 owners, 3 sub-owners and thought: "This doesn't make any sense. It's too messy." Many times, they created a family, but instead of valuing their own, they ended up flattering guys from other families and became just supporting characters, without relevance. With Auditore, I wanted to do things differently. Yes, we are - different. Auditore was created to be independent and not just another one.

rules.title: RULES AND INFORMATION
rules.rule2: Do not speak about Auditore matters with outsiders. Pretty obvious, right? Do not disclose internal matters to outsiders.
rules.rule3: Avoid internal fights. If something bothers you, seek one of Auditore's leaders to resolve it privately.
rules.rule4: What happens in our WhatsApp and Discord groups stays in our group. Do not spread things we say and share around (this applies to everything, stickers, links, and other less important things).
rules.rule5: Do not 'panel' wrong. We use this term a lot when someone is about to do or say something stupid. If you know doing something will harm you, don't do it. Don't come crying later because you were banned and want to act right. If you messed up, own it and move on.
rules.rule6: We do not allow Auditore (SA:MP) to have 2 organization leaders at the same time; only one at a time is allowed. Remember: always notify before assuming leadership, this is not a mess.
rules.rule7: Any act that harms Auditore and its members is prohibited. Examples: conspiring against and leaving the group in the background. If you entered the game and saw Auditore is Grove, stick with Grove. Damn, we giving our lives in the Grove war and you stick with Vagos? Where's the common sense? This is disunited people attitude. I don't want this kind of thing happening here.
rules.rule8: Everyone has the right to express their opinions, as long as respectfully, without degrading or humiliating anyone. Suggestions are always welcome.
rules.rule9: We recruit only people we believe fit the Auditore profile; sticking together is not enough. This analysis will be done by those responsible.
rules.rule10: If for some reason you want to leave Auditore, seek the person responsible privately and tell the truth. Say: 'Look, I'm leaving Auditore for this reason' or simply you don't even need to say the reason, just say: "I'm leaving the family for personal reasons, thanks for the opportunity". Just don't make up excuses to leave, because it's very obvious and it will look bad for you. If you leave, leave with your head held high, without lies or fights with anyone.
